title: PROJECT SKINS unavailable at store???
body:
So i went to the store hoping to buy PROJECT: Ekko but it
 says its unavailable, i can't buy him but it shows up at the store, so i wonder if this is only me? or they don't release them yet? ty

replies.body: Brah They didnt release it lol Its the same for me i wanted to buy project ashe and it said the same thing
any ideas when they come out?
Probably Tuesday. Releasing it on Thursday wouldn't leave a big enough window between then and Patch 6.16 with the SKT skins.
As far as I have seen, riot hasn't released an official release date for the skins. But in the last Patch Notes for 6.15 they said the new Project skins will be releasing during this patch.
I got the same, they'll be out and available in the shop when Ashe is in the log in screen
